remarks: A projective subspace sandwiched between a set of atoms and the set's projective subspace closure equals the closure.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
pclid.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pclid.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
pclbtwnN $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ X e. S ) /\ ( Y C_ X /\ X C_ ( U ` Y ) ) ) -> X = ( U ` Y ) ) $.
